title: Jillian's Engagement Story! Prioritizing Eye Health! The Benefits of Chewing Gum?!
description:
Jillian has discovered that true love means never having to say you're sorry things aren't going as planned. Eye health tips about different types of light, helpful foods, The Bates Method, and more! Plus, after becoming completely intrigued by a Ben Greenfield article about chewing different types of gum, she digs in!


For 25% off The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels, go to www.thefitnessapp.com/podcastdeal

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Jillian Michaels Community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1880466198675549

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com
